verses.verse: Then Shephatiah <S%H8203><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Mattan <S%H4977><s%>, and Gedaliah <S%H1436><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pashur <S%H6583><s%>, and Jucal <S%H3116><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shelemiah <S%H8018><s%>, and Pashur <S%H6583><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Malchiah <S%H4441><s%>, heard <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> that Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> unto all the people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, He that remains <S%H3427><s%> in this city <S%H5892><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>, by the famine <S%H7458><s%>, and by the pestilence <S%H1698><s%>: but he that goes forth <S%H3318><s%> to the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%> shall live <S%H2421><s%>; for he shall have his life <S%H5315><s%> for a prey <S%H7998><s%>, and shall live <S%H2421><s%>.

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, This city <S%H5892><s%> shall surely <S%H5414><s%> be given <S%H5414><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>'s army <S%H2428><s%>, which shall take it <S%H3920><s%>.

Therefore the princes <S%H8269><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%>, We beg you <S%H376><s%>, let this man be put to death <S%H4191><s%>: for thus <S%H3651><s%> he weakens <S%H7503><s%> the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> that remain <S%H7604><s%> in this city <S%H5892><s%>, and the hands <S%H3027><s%> of all the people <S%H5971><s%>, in speaking <S%H1696><s%> such words <S%H1697><s%> unto them <S%H376><s%>: for this man seeks <S%H1875><s%> not the welfare <S%H7965><s%> of this people <S%H5971><s%>, but the hurt <S%H7451><s%>.

Then Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H3027><s%>, he is in your hand: for the king <S%H4428><s%> is not he that can <S%H3201><s%> do any thing against you <S%H1697><s%>.

Then took <S%H3947><s%> they Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>, and cast <S%H7993><s%> him into the dungeon <S%H953><s%> of Malchiah <S%H4441><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hammelech <S%H4428><s%>, that was in the court <S%H2691><s%> of the prison <S%H4307><s%>: and they let down <S%H7971><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> with cords <S%H2256><s%>. And in the dungeon <S%H953><s%> there was no water <S%H4325><s%>, but mire <S%H2916><s%>: so Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> sunk <S%H2883><s%> in the mire <S%H2916><s%>.

Now when Ebed <S%H5663><s%>–melech the Ethiopian <S%H3569><s%>, one <S%H376><s%> of the eunuchs <S%H5631><s%> which was in the king <S%H4428><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>, heard <S%H8085><s%> that they had put <S%H5414><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> in the dungeon <S%H953><s%>; the king <S%H4428><s%> then sitting <S%H3427><s%> in the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>;
Ebed <S%H5663><s%>–melech went forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the king <S%H4428><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>, and spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

My lord <S%H113><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>, these men <S%H582><s%> have done evil <S%H7489><s%> in all that they have done <S%H6213><s%> to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%>, whom they have cast <S%H7993><s%> into the dungeon <S%H953><s%>; and he is like to die <S%H4191><s%> for <S%H6440><s%> hunger <S%H7458><s%> in the place <S%H8478><s%> where he is <S%H3899><s%>: for there is no more bread in the city <S%H5892><s%>.

Then the king <S%H4428><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Ebed <S%H5663><s%>–melech the Ethiopian <S%H3569><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Take <S%H3947><s%> from here thirty <S%H7970><s%> men <S%H582><s%> with you <S%H3027><s%>, and take up <S%H5927><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> out of the dungeon <S%H953><s%>, before he die <S%H4191><s%>.

So Ebed <S%H5663><s%>–melech took <S%H3947><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> with him <S%H3027><s%>, and went <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> under the treasury <S%H214><s%>, and took <S%H3947><s%> there old <S%H1094><s%> cast rags <S%H5499><s%> and old <S%H1094><s%> rotten garments <S%H4418><s%>, and let them down <S%H7971><s%> by cords <S%H2256><s%> into the dungeon <S%H953><s%> to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>.

And Ebed <S%H5663><s%>–melech the Ethiopian <S%H3569><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>, Put <S%H7760><s%> now these old <S%H1094><s%> cast rags <S%H5499><s%> and rotten garments <S%H4418><s%> under your armholes <S%H679><s%> under the cords <S%H2256><s%>. And Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> did so <S%H6213><s%>.

So they drew up <S%H4900><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> with cords <S%H2256><s%>, and took him up <S%H5927><s%> out of the dungeon <S%H953><s%>: and Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> remained <S%H3427><s%> in the court <S%H2691><s%> of the prison <S%H4307><s%>.

Then Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%>, and took <S%H3947><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> unto him into the third <S%H7992><s%> entry <S%H3996><s%> that is in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: and the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>, I will ask <S%H7592><s%> you a thing <S%H1697><s%>; hide nothing from me <S%H3582><s%>.

Then Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%>, If I declare <S%H5046><s%> it unto you <S%H4191><s%>, will you not surely put me to death <S%H4191><s%>? and if I give you counsel <S%H3289><s%>, will you not listen unto me <S%H8085><s%>?

So Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> secretly <S%H5643><s%> unto Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, As the Lord <S%H3068><s%> lives <S%H2416><s%>, that made <S%H6213><s%> us this soul <S%H5315><s%>, I will not put you to death <S%H4191><s%>, neither will I give <S%H5414><s%> you into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of these men <S%H582><s%> that seek <S%H1245><s%> your life <S%H5315><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> unto Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%>, Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; If you will assuredly <S%H3318><s%> go forth <S%H3318><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>'s princes <S%H8269><s%>, then your soul <S%H5315><s%> shall live <S%H2421><s%>, and this city <S%H5892><s%> shall not be burned <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>; and you shall live <S%H2421><s%>, and your house <S%H1004><s%>:

But if you will not go forth <S%H3318><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>'s princes <S%H8269><s%>, then shall this city <S%H5892><s%> be given <S%H5414><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%>, and they shall burn <S%H8313><s%> it with fire <S%H784><s%>, and you shall not escape out <S%H4422><s%> of their hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>, I am afraid <S%H1672><s%> of the Jews <S%H3064><s%> that are fallen <S%H5307><s%> to the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%>, lest they deliver <S%H5414><s%> me into their hand <S%H3027><s%>, and they mock me <S%H5953><s%>.

But Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, They shall not deliver <S%H5414><s%> you <S%H8085><s%>. Obey, I beg you <S%H6963><s%>, the voice of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, which I speak <S%H1696><s%> unto you <S%H3190><s%>: so it shall be well unto you <S%H5315><s%>, and your soul shall live <S%H2421><s%>.
But if you refuse <S%H3986><s%> to go forth <S%H3318><s%>, this is the word <S%H1697><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has showed me <S%H7200><s%>:

And <S%H802><s%>, behold, all the women that are left <S%H7604><s%> in the king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> shall be brought forth <S%H3318><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>'s princes <S%H8269><s%>, and those women shall say <S%H559><s%>, Your friends <S%H582><s%> have set you on <S%H5496><s%>, and have prevailed <S%H3201><s%> against you <S%H7272><s%>: your feet are sunk <S%H2883><s%> in the mire <S%H1206><s%>, and they are turned away <S%H5472><s%> back <S%H268><s%>.

So they shall bring out <S%H3318><s%> all your wives <S%H802><s%> and your sons <S%H1121><s%> to the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%>: and you shall not escape out <S%H4422><s%> of their hand <S%H3027><s%>, but shall be taken <S%H8610><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>: and you shall cause this city <S%H5892><s%> to be burned <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>.
Then said <S%H559><s%> Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> unto Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>, Let no man <S%H376><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> of these words <S%H1697><s%>, and you shall not die <S%H4191><s%>.

But if the princes <S%H8269><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> that I have talked <S%H1696><s%> with you <S%H935><s%>, and they come unto you <S%H559><s%>, and say unto you <S%H5046><s%>, Declare unto us now what you have said <S%H1696><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%>, hide <S%H3582><s%> it not from us <S%H4191><s%>, and we will not put you to death; also what the king <S%H4428><s%> said unto you <S%H1696><s%>:

Then you shall say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H5307><s%>, I presented my supplication <S%H8467><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>, that he would not cause me to return <S%H7725><s%> to Jonathan <S%H3083><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>, to die there <S%H4191><s%>.

Then came <S%H935><s%> all the princes <S%H8269><s%> unto Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>, and asked <S%H7592><s%> him <S%H5046><s%>: and he told them according to all these words <S%H1697><s%> that the king <S%H4428><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%>. So they left off speaking <S%H2790><s%> with him <S%H1697><s%>; for the matter was not perceived <S%H8085><s%>.

So Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in the court <S%H2691><s%> of the prison <S%H4307><s%> until the day <S%H3117><s%> that Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> was taken <S%H3920><s%>: and he was there when Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> was taken <S%H3920><s%>.
